text:
Just added ISTIO MESH for Kubernetes (KRIB) using the advanced Helm chart configuration features just pulled into tip.
<https://youtu.be/qWSB3TTVUC8>

text: This capability is available for anything with a Helm chart.  We tried to enable a lot of features in the new helm chart runner - we'd love to hear if we got all of the ones you need
Anyone know how to solve the "Bad archive mirror" when trying to install debian?
